nodes.text: Joali was a male individual who lived with his wife Jalice Andit in Jedha City on the moon Jedha. The couple thrived in the chaos of the city created by the Jedha insurgency and were loosely affiliated with Saw Gerrera's partisans, often aiding them in their fight against the Galactic Empire, as long as they kept the credits flowing to them and were allowed to participate in violent outbreaks.
